main event: A civilian observed a black long moving object in Jamaica, Long Island, New York on December 22, 1959.
interesting points: The object changed course while approaching the observer's position before disappearing from view,The sighting occurred prior to daybreak, making it difficult to evaluate speed and course,The duration of the observation was about 5-10 minutes,The source of the report was a civilian witness,The report requests follow-up due to insufficient data for evaluation.
